metadata.title: FA Analyze 32 02

config.question: Which of the following most accurately identifies one of the more troubling aspects of the economic downturn that occurred in 2002 as the prospect of another war with Iraq loomed on the horizon?

choices.content: Despite the severe economic problems Americans were facing, including high unemployment, retail sales figures did not decline.
It was revealed that American corporations had used shocking financial practices leading to billions of dollars in losses for American shareholders.
It was revealed that American intelligence agencies had conducted surveillance of day-trading investment sites and that there had been federal manipulation of markets.
While inflation continued to be an issue during this downturn, employment figures continued to rise.

answer_3.response: Consider This: In 2002, following the devastating effects the September 11, 2001, attacks had on the U.S. economy, the economy began to recover, only to relapse amid concern over the threat of war with Iraq. One of the most troubling aspects of the economic downturn was the implosion of major corporations. See L.O. 32.4 Republicans Resurgent.
